entities.name: barnabas
entities.description: The main character of the story. He is described as 'Barmy' but a torch burning in his bracket on a stone wall suggests he may be experiencing some kind of vision or dream.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: A character who is sleeping and snoring loudly. He wakes up Harry, indicating that Ron is likely a friend or companion to Harry.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: The main character of the story. He is woken up by Ron's snoring and experiences a vivid dream or vision involving a door.

relationships.description: Barnabas sees the door at the far end of the windowless passage. This is described as a 'leap of excitement' and suggests that Barnabas is eager to open the door.
Harry sees the door in his dream or vision. He stretches out his hand to open it, but then wakes up and realizes that the door is not real.
Harry is woken up by Ron's snoring. This suggests a close relationship between Harry and Ron, as well as the fact that they are likely friends or companions.
